---
name: create-instructions
description: Describe when to use this prompt
agent: instructions generator
---
Take the information below and generate an agent instructions .md file in the /docs folder. If a .md filename is provided, use it, otherwise generate an appropiate filename based on the genrated content. Make sure the instructions are concise and not too long. Make sure to update the AGENT.md file to reference the new instructions file. If no information is provided below, prompt the user to give you the necessary details about the layer of architecture or coding standards to document.
